Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.middleware.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The main node in the client-server architecture of the middleware.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server​(int port)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs an instance of the server.
        Parameters:
        port - the port on which the server will be listening.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of errors in creating the server socket.

    • Method Detail

      • registerIdAck

        public void registerIdAck()
        Invoked by the connection of a player sending an ACK of his newly-received ID. The main purpose of this method is awakening the waiting thread in run() that handles the sequential access to the game.

      • register

        public void register​(Connection c)
        Adds the connection to the list, associating it with the relative virtual view.
        Parameters:
        c - the connection just created between a new client and the server.

      • letClientIn

        public void letClientIn()
        Method used to force the sequential access to the game, in order to assign the IDs properly. While the connections and views are collected by the server as the socket is accepted, the controller receives the views only when this method is invoked.

      • run

        public void run()
        Handles the incoming connection requests and runs the thread that manage the access of clients to the game.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
